title: The Arctic Seed Vault
description: The Arctic Seed Vault is an informational book about the Svalbard Global Seed Vault located in the Arctic Circle. Readers will learn about why the isolated location was chosen for protecting seeds, the purpose the vault serves for countries around the world, and what it looks like inside the seed bank. This book can also be used to teach students how to determine the main idea and details and the proper use of conjunctions.
